title: Meet the Beetles
description: Beetles are amazing insects. There are more kinds of beetles than any other living creature on the planet. Meet the Beetles provides students with a comprehensive look at these fascinating insects. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and supporting details and the proper use of simple predicates.
reviewWords: beetles, deserts, insects, jungles, skeleton, waste
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Determine the main idea and details of a text
awareness: Short Vowel Sounds                : Discriminate short vowel /i/ sound
grammar: Simple Predicates                : Recognize and use simple predicates
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words can, eat, live
